name: Simple Ludo
description:
Ludo is one of the most popular board games in many counties. This Simple Ludo, support "Team Mode" creatively, you can play together with friends in one team against others in another team. If you are a good player, you can challenge 1 vs 3!

* More than 10 kinds of player icons.
* Lucky Draw after each game, get free Magic Dices.
* Creatively Team Mode.
* New game rule 'Team Push' : the pieces in the same team can push forward each other when they fall into one grid.
* Enhanced AI design.
* Detailed game data statistics.

How to play?
* Each player has 4 planes start in the base.
* Roll the dice to move each plane around the board.
* Plane will jump if stop at the grid has the same color with the plane.
* Plane will kick other planes back to base if stop at the grid that other places already stopped at. The planes with the same team do not kick each other.
* All planes reach the goal in a team firstly, the team win.
